title: Rights Corridor
subtitle:

title: Dr Melanie O'Brien
subtitle: Today was the final day of 'Master' training, i.e. training the trainers. They teach #women skills & then teach them to teach those skills to other #Rohingya women, to expand the reach. Sessions are run by some fantastic women from #Korea. #refugees #humanRightspic.twitter.com/BHFuAIiKUy

title: Dr Melanie O'Brien

title: UNHCR Northern Europe
subtitle:
